name: Harvester (itch) (Telomeri)
description:
Fight as a robot bunny vs a harvester. Made for indie games lab jam "bullethell".

The project was the first game I've ever made, and the goal was to complete it in a week. I can see multiple areas for improvement, but I am overall happy with the end result. The harvester has 3 attacks, one of them by blocking player projectiles. 

Everything in the "game" is done by me. The game is done using godot engine, and art using clip studio.

The game requires keyboard and mouse to be played.
